title: Bus.Simulator.16.Gold.Edition-TiNYiSO
description:
-=- Proudly Presents

Bus Simulator 16: Gold Edition
 (c) Astragon Entertainment

Release On   : 25 August 2017           Disk Amount/Format : 1 Disc
Type of Game : Simulation               Media Protection   : Steam

Experience golden times with Bus Simulator 16! Get all buses and missions
for a complete gameplay experience!

Gold Edition Content

Additionally to the full version of the successful Bus Simulator 16 the
Gold Edition offers you all currently released DLCs and updates such as:

Additional buses:

MAN Lion's City A 47 M
Mercedes-Benz Citaro
Mercedes-Benz Citaro L
Mercedes-Benz Citaro G
MAN Lion's City CNG
MAN Lion's City L CNG
MAN Lion's City GL CNG

Additional missions:

The Wachowski Missions: Meet the rich philanthropist and huge bus fan Tim
Wachowski. Master his five challenging tasks and get thrilling awards to
expand your public transport empire.

Mission Pack 2: Mira Tannhauser from Sunny Springs city administration is
calling. She wants to boost tourism in town and your task is to organize
their transport. Plan new routes, make them profitable and earn huge
amounts of money � as well as the eternal gratitude of the city
administration.

Burn/mount, install, copy crack, play!

Greetz: LARGEiSO and MEDIUMiSO

                                        (C) E/dfs
